name: One With The Force
description: While you defend or perform an attack, if you are stressed, you may spend 1 {forcecharge} to change up to 2 of your {focus} results to {evade}/{hit} results.

name: Uncanny Maneuvering
description: If you have no active {forcecharge}, after you reveal a bank [{bl} or {br}] or turn [{sl} or {sr}] maneuver, you may increase the difficulty of the maneuver. If you do, perform that maneuver as a sideslip and recover 1 {forcecharge}.You may choose not to recover force in the end phase.

name: Guardian Angel
description: While a friendly ship in your firing arc defends, you may spend 1 {forcecharge}. If you do, the attacker rolls 1 fewer attack die.

name: Force Synergy
description: After you fully execute a maneuver, you may choose a friendly ship at range 1-2 and spend 2 {forcecharge}. That ship may perform an action, even while stressed.

name: Reassuring Presence
description: After a friendly ship fully executes a red maneuver, if it is at range 0-3, you may spend 1 {forcecharge}. If you do, that ship gains 1 focus token or recovers 1 {forcecharge}.

name: Force Sensitive
description: After you become the defender (before dice are rolled), you may recover 1 {forcecharge}.

name: Battle Mind
description: While you defend at attack range 1, you may spend 2 {forcecharge} to prevent the range 1 bonus. While you perform an attack against a defender at attack range 2-3, you may spend 1 {forcecharge} to apply the range 1 bonus.

name: Uncanny Aim
description: While you perform a primary attack, before the Neutralize Results step, you may spend 2 {forcecharge} to cancel 1 {evade} result.

name: Course Correction
description: After a friendly ship at range 0-2 reveals its dial, you may spend 1 [Force]. If you do, set its dial to another maneuver of the same speed and difficulty.

name: Stay Focused
description: After a friendly ship at range 0-2 spends a focus token, you may spend 1 [Force]. If you do, that ship gains 1 focus token.

name: Trust your Feelings
description: After another friendly ship at range 0-3 spends 1 or more [Force], you may spend 1 [Force]. If you do, that ship recovers 1 [Force].

name: Dead to Rights
description: After you fully execute a maneuver, if there is an enemy ship in your [Front Arc] at range 0-1 or in your [Bullseye Arc], you may spend 1 [Force] to remove 1 stress token.

name: Force Precognition
description: After you fully execute a maneuver, you may choose a friendly ship at range 0-1 and spend 1 [Force]. That ship may perform an action, even if it is stressed.

name: Jedi Training
description: After you fully execute a red maneuver, recover 1 [Force].

name: Trust in the Force
description: After you execute a maneuver, if there are more enemy ships than other friendly ships at range 0-1, you may spend 1 [Force]. If you do, gain 1 focus token.

name: Against all Odds
description: After you execute a maneuver, if there are more enemy ships than other friendly ships at range 0-1, you may spend 1 [Force]. If you do, remove 1 red token of your choice.

name: Into the Storm
description: After you fully execute a maneuver, if there are more enemy ships than other friendly ships at range, you may spend 1 [Force]. If you do, you may perform a [Barrel Roll] or [Boost] action.

name: Rally
description: At the start of the End Phase, you may perfrom a purple [Coordinate] action, even while stressed.

name: Force Momentum
description: At the start of the End Phase, you may spend any number of [Force] to choose that many friendly ships at range 0-2. Each chosen ship does not remove 1 focus or evade token during this End Phase.

name: Force Equilibrium
description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may spend 1 [Force] and choose another friendly ship at range 0-2. If you do, you may transfer 1 green token to it or transfer one orange token from it to yourself.

name: May the Force be with You
description: While a friendly ship at range 0-2 defends, if it is not in the attacker's [Bullseye Arc], you may spend 1 [Force]. If you do, change 1 [Critical Hit] result to a [Hit] result or 1 [Hit] result to a [Focus] result.

name: Combat Awareness
description: While a friendly ship at range 0-2 performs an attack, if the defender is in its [Bullseye Arc], you may spend 1 [Force] to change 1 [Focus] result to a [Hit] result or 1 [Hit] result to a [Critical Hit] result.

name: Force Projection
description: While an enemy ship in your [Front Arc] at range 0-1 performs an attack, the defender may change 1 blank result to a [Focus] result.

name: Force Defender
description: While another friendly ship defends, if the attacker is in its [Bullseye Arc], you may spend 1 [Force] to change 1 of the defender's blank results to a [Focus] result.

name: Tricked Mind
description: While you defend at attack range 1, you may spend 1 [Force]. If you do, the attacker cannot apply the range bonus. While you perform an attack against a defender at attack range 3, you may spend 1 [Force]. If you do, the defender cannot apply the range bonus.

name: Force Adept
description: While you defend or perform an attack, if the enemy ship is in your [Front Arc], you may spend 1 [Force] to change 1 of your blank results to an [Evade] or [Hit] result.

name: Force Interference
description: While you or a ship in your [Single Turret Arc] defends, you may spend 1 [Force]. If you do, the attacker rolls 1 fewer attack die.

name: Force Push
description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 enemy ship in your [Single Turret Arc] at range 0-2 and spend 1 [Force]. If you do, that ship gains 1 stress token unless it removes 1 green token.
